title: Public Access to Resource Hub
description: Verify that public users can access the Resource Hub homepage without login, use search and category filters effectively, and click tracking records interactions.

steps.description: Navigate to the Resource Hub homepage as a public user without logging in
Verify the Resource Hub page loads successfully on supported devices and browsers
Use the search input to search for a valid keyword
Verify search results match the keyword and update responsively
Apply category filters from the available categories
Verify results update accordingly to selected categories
Click on a resource link
Verify click is tracked in backend logs or click tracking system

title: Public Access to Club Announcements and RSVP
description: Ensure public users can view club announcements, RSVP to events, and attendance tracking records entries without login.

steps.description: Navigate to the Activity News & Announcements page as a public user
Verify announcements load and display correctly with event details
Fill out RSVP form for an event with valid inputs
Verify RSVP submission succeeds and attendance tracking updates accordingly
Attempt to RSVP with invalid or incomplete data
Verify appropriate error messages are shown and RSVP is rejected

title: Authentication for IT Prefects and Admins
description: Verify that authentication via NextAuth.js with username and password enforces role-based access controls and protects admin pages.

steps.description: Navigate to login page and perform a successful login as an IT Prefect
Verify login succeeds and user is redirected to Team Dashboard with relevant features
Navigate to an admin-only page as IT Prefect user
Verify access is denied or redirected due to insufficient permissions
Log out, then log in as an Admin user
Verify Admin user can access admin console and manage users, content, and system settings
Attempt login with incorrect password
Verify login is rejected with relevant error message

title: User Profile Management and Password Change
description: Verify authenticated users can update personal information, change passwords securely verifying current credentials, and manage preferences.

steps.description: Login as an authenticated user
Navigate to User Profile Management page
Update profile information (e.g., email, display name) and save
Verify updates persist and are reflected accurately
Initiate password change by entering current password and new password
Verify password change is successful if current password is correct
Attempt password change with wrong current password
Verify password change is rejected with appropriate error
Modify user preferences and save
Verify preference changes are saved and applied

title: Training Library Multi-format and Filtering
description: Ensure training library resources of different formats (video, text, file) load correctly, and filters by category and difficulty work as specified.

steps.description: Login as an IT Prefect and navigate to Training Library
Verify various resource formats render appropriately and can be accessed
Filter training resources by category
Verify filtered results correspond to selected category
Filter training resources by difficulty level
Verify filtered results correspond to chosen difficulty
Search the training library using search terms
Verify search results are accurate and responsive
Attempt to load a non-existent resource
Verify system handles gracefully with informative error

title: Team Dashboard Features and Permissions
description: Verify that authenticated IT Prefects can access and manage Team Dashboard including mission statements, organizational structures, calendar, tasks, and events management according to role permissions.

steps.description: Login as IT Prefect with task management permissions
Navigate to Team Dashboard
Verify team mission and org structure display properly
Create a new calendar event
Verify event is added and visible on calendar
Add a new task and assign it
Verify task appears in tasks list and assigned user can see it
Attempt to perform unauthorized action (e.g. deleting a team member) with limited-role user
Verify action is blocked and user receives permission error

title: Admin Console Resource Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify admin users can perform full CRUD operations on resources and categories with validation, batch actions, inline editing, and undo/redo support.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to Resource Management console
Create a new resource with valid data
Verify resource is created and visible in the list
Edit the resource inline to update fields
Verify inline editing saves and updates the resource properly
Perform batch actions e.g. bulk delete multiple resources
Verify batch actions execute correctly and resource list updates accordingly
Undo the last batch delete action
Verify resources are restored correctly
Attempt to create resource with invalid or missing mandatory fields
Verify validation prevents creation and errors displayed

title: Admin Console Article Publishing Workflow
description: Verify full article lifecycle with draft creation, editing, publishing, and public viewing through slug-based routes.

steps.description: Login as admin
Create a new article draft in admin console
Verify the draft is saved and listed correctly
Edit the article and save changes
Verify updates persist in draft state
Publish the article
Verify article status updates to published and visible to public users via slug URL
Access published article public page by slug
Verify article content renders correctly and metadata is accurate
Attempt to access article with invalid slug
Verify proper 404 or error page is shown

title: Real-time Notification System Functionality and Performance
description: Ensure notifications are delivered in real-time to users, displayed properly in notification bar and client hooks without UI glitches or performance degradation.

steps.description: Login as any user who should receive notifications
Trigger notification from backend (e.g. new event announcement)
Verify notification appears in real-time in notification bar UI
Verify notification data is accessible via client hooks
Trigger multiple notifications rapidly
Verify UI handles multiple notifications without performance degradation or glitches
Dismiss notifications and verify removal from notification bar
Verify dismissed notifications are not shown again

title: Database-backed System Settings and Maintenance Mode
description: Verify system settings stored in database apply immediately upon change from admin console, including activating maintenance mode with public fallback UI.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to System Settings console
Modify a system setting (e.g. enable maintenance mode)
Verify setting change is saved in database with no errors
Verify maintenance mode activates immediately and public users see maintenance fallback UI
Disable maintenance mode
Verify normal site functionality resumes for public users

title: Security and Unauthorized Data Access Prevention
description: Verify security enforcement that unauthorized users cannot access restricted data or perform actions outside their role permissions, including password change verification.

steps.description: Attempt to directly access admin APIs without authentication
Verify access is denied with appropriate 401 or 403 errors
Login as IT Prefect and attempt to access another user's private data
Verify access is blocked due to permission restrictions
Attempt password change via user profile with incorrect current password
Verify password change request is rejected and error returned
Inspect API responses to confirm no sensitive data leakage
Confirm only authorized fields are exposed per role

title: UI Responsiveness, Accessibility, and Design Compliance
description: Ensure the site UI components adhere to responsive design, accessibility guidelines, and design standards including smooth animations and intuitive navigation.

steps.description: Open the site on multiple screen sizes and devices including mobile, tablet, and desktop
Verify layout adapts fluidly with no broken elements or overflow
Navigate through all main site pages using keyboard only
Verify focus states, tab order, and keyboard operability conform to accessibility standards
Use screen reader tool to navigate pages
Verify content is properly read with appropriate ARIA attributes
Observe animations and transitions during interactions
Verify animations are smooth and do not cause visual glitches

title: Database Migration for MySQL Environment
description: Ensure database migrations apply cleanly on MySQL setups, maintaining schema consistency and preventing data loss.

steps.description: Backup current MySQL database
Apply latest Prisma migrations using CLI or migration scripts
Verify migration completes without errors or warnings
Verify data integrity post migration by validating key tables and relationships
Verify application functions normally connecting to migrated database
